EmailTemplate.subject: {{{Case.Contact_FirstName__c}}}, how was your recent experience with us?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{{Case.Contact_FirstName__c}}},
You recently reached out to our Seller Support Team regarding this case < https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/case/{{Case.Id}} > , and {{{Case.OwnerFirstName__c}}} was in charge of assisting you.
We'd be extremely grateful to hear your thoughts about your conversation and the way you were supported.
